songs.title: Scarface Phone Convo #2
songs.lyrics:
[Interlude: T.I. and Scarface]
Man, shit, I love that kind of shit, dog
I love what a great gang
That's for real
I love it
Don't cool down now, stay up with it, TIP
You know you my lil nigga, man
And I'm standin behind you
You for real
Forever ever ever
Double ever ever
Never let them dudes fuck you up
I stay ridin, man
You say you ain't never ever ever
Ever ever ever ever
For real, man
So this nigga ain't ever been sited in the cut, nowhere, man
No, no, no
You know what, TIP, that's the problem with them older niggas, cause they like, nigga, we stood up, in the motherfuckin trentches
For another nigga to come and rep it, and half ass, you know what I'm sayin, it couldn't be credible
Yeah
That's just how it goes
I'm just real, man, you know
